info.title: Releasy Enterprise API
info.description: Releasy Enterprise API surface including core and enterprise endpoints.

get.description: Returns ok when the API and database are reachable.
Returns ok when the API process is running.
Returns the generated OpenAPI JSON document.
Returns ok when the API is ready to serve requests.
Lists audit events with optional filters and pagination.

parameters.name: created_from
parameters.description: Filter events created at or after timestamp

parameters.name: created_to
parameters.description: Filter events created at or before timestamp

get.description: Lists customers with optional filters. Requires platform_support or platform_admin role.

post.description: Creates a new customer record. Requires platform_admin role.

get.description: Fetches a customer record. Requires platform_support or platform_admin role.

patch.description: Updates customer name, plan, or suspension. Requires platform_admin role.

get.description: Lists entitlements for a customer with optional product filtering.

post.description: Creates an entitlement for a customer. Requires platform_admin role.

delete.description: Deletes an entitlement for a customer. Requires platform_admin role.

patch.description: Updates an existing entitlement for a customer. Requires platform_admin role.

post.description: Creates an API key for a customer. Requires platform_admin role.
Revokes an API key for a customer. Requires platform_support or platform_admin.
Returns API key metadata when the key is valid and authorized.
Creates a download token for an artifact. Requires API key with downloads:token scope.

get.description: Resolves a download token and redirects to the artifact download URL.
Lists releases. Admins can filter all statuses; API keys only see published releases for entitled products.

post.description: Creates a draft release. Requires platform_admin or release_publisher.

409.description: Release already exists or idempotency conflict

post.description: Registers an uploaded artifact. Requires platform_admin or release_publisher.

409.description: Artifact already exists or idempotency conflict

post.description: Returns a presigned URL for uploading an artifact. Requires platform_admin or release_publisher.
Publishes a draft release. Requires platform_admin or release_publisher.

get.description: Lists users with optional filters. Requires platform_support or platform_admin role.

post.description: Creates a new user. Requires platform_admin role.

get.description: Fetches a user by id. Requires platform_support or platform_admin role.

patch.description: Updates user fields. Requires platform_admin role.

put.description: Replaces user groups. Requires platform_admin role.

post.description: Triggers a credential reset email. Requires platform_support or platform_admin role.
